api.description: Main FastAPI application - All backend symbols including routers, services, repositories, schemas. Use apiLayers for targeted layer access.

shared.description: Shared utilities and helpers - Common functions, constants, and utilities used across the application.

routers.description: API route handlers - FastAPI routers, endpoints, dependency injection, request/response handling

services.description: Business logic services - Domain operations, orchestration, validation, business rules

repositories.description: Data access layer - SQLAlchemy repositories, database queries, transaction management, RLS

schemas.description: Pydantic schemas - Request/response models, DTOs, validation schemas

models.description: SQLAlchemy models - ORM models, database table definitions, relationships

cores.description: Core infrastructure - Auth, middleware, dependencies, error handling, observability

metadata.description: Template for Python FastAPI backend with SQLAlchemy ORM. Common patterns: Pydantic schemas, dependency injection, async endpoints, Alembic migrations. Adjust directories in extraction.python to match your project structure (app/, src/, api/, etc.).
